text: The Petrified Forest is a 1936 American crime drama movie directed by Archie Mayo and was based on the play of the same name by Robert E. Sherwood. It stars Leslie Howard, Humphrey Bogart, Bette Davis, Joseph Sawyer, Genevieve Tobin, Porter Hall, Dick Foran, Eddie Acuff and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 drama movies Category:1930s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Archie Mayo
title: The Petrified Forest
